'''Lightfoot''' was a [[horse]] of [[Rohan]], and sire of [[Snowmane]], the mount of King [[Théoden]]. Lightfoot is mentioned on the inscription on Snowmane's [[Snowmane's Howe|grave]].<ref>{{RK|V6}}</ref>
